description:
Approval of details pursuant to condition AG16 (Arsenal event day coach parking locations) of planning permission ref: P061170.

Condition AG16 of planning permission ref: P061170 states:

'That during any major event, at least 40 coach parking spaces shall be made available for use within the stadium or at another location(s) outside the stadium previously agreed by the Council'

The proposed parking locations in order of priority:

Queensland Road (18 spaces)
Hornsey Road (13 spaces if double stacked)
Sobell Centre (12 spaces)
Hornsey Street (11 spaces)
Finsbury Park (90+ spaces)

The applicant is seeking a permanent permission.
decision_conditions:
Temporary 4 Year Permission

CONDITION: The permission is granted for a temporary four (4) year period only, covering the following football seasons:
2015/2016
2016/2017
2017/2018
2019/2020

The applicant shall submit for approval further coach parking proposals for approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of the 2020/2021 football season. 

REASON: In the interests of ensuring that the coach parking arrangements around the Emirates Football stadium are the most effective and efficient for protecting the amenity of nearby occupiers in the future as well as minimising and disruption to the highway network. The temporary timeframe would enable the potential for future improvements to technology and therefore a potential alternative coach parking scenario that still accords with Anti-Terror Advice may be found in the future.
